(I've noticed, for one, not to pick on these two personally, but there is a subject title called "OOC to RoboRick".  The recent posts for that have not been OOC.  Please change the title, Logomorph and RoboRick.


Another thing, people responding to posts, yet they have nothing to do with them.  An example that I've encountered.

Someone does something in the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire, JP3884 replies to it and has Megatron walking around talking to some of his minions, nowhere near the CF.  That's the freshest one I could remember.

Please don't do this.  

Thank you))


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
